channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘The Rings Of Power’ Episode 6 Review: A Glimpse At This Show’s Potential, And At Its Shortcomings
item.description: In brief moments, The Rings Of Power shows us glimpses of the show it should have been. But Episode 6 is another miss.
